level.heading: CERTIFICATION BY A QUALIFIED HIGH TECHNOLOGY COMPANY (QHTC) (ยง 9-1101)

level.text: To claim a credit or other benefit, a QHTC shall attach to its applicable tax return or claim for refund an original affidavit certifying in good faith that it is a QHTC.
The affidavit must be on the form prescribed by the Office of Tax and Revenue.

A business which certifies that it is a QHTC shall be subject to audit to the same extent as any other taxpayer in determining District tax liability, applicable credits, exemptions and to verify that it is or was a QHTC.
